resources.string:
Packet Sender for Android

Thank you for supporting software that supports you!

This app contains :

• no ads
• no bundleware
• no internal tracking or analytics software
• no pop-ups begging for likes or reviews
• only the bare minimum permissions to do its work

If you like the mobile version, check out the free desktop version! Also, please tell your friends about Packet Sender.

Packet Sender is wholly owned and © Dan Nagle.
